column1: #Text=( ( WS ) ) What are your thoughts on the Tea Party movement ?
#Text=( ( JS ) ) I just recently read a Newsweek article about the Tea Party .
#Text=An excerpt that particularly caught my eye was : The Tea Party rejects the idea that “ ... a government of brainy people can solve thorny problems through complex legislation .
#Text=" The Tea Party finds its strongest spirit among conservative Republicans .
